<div class="brand">
        
 <img src="https://camerry.in/images/logo.svg"
 alt="cammery icon"
 width="60px"/>
 <h3>Cammery Ice Cream</h3>
     </div>
<div class="content" >
  <p>
    Once upon a time, a bunch of ice cream fanatics, all of them cousins, came together to create a world full of creamy, delicious, and real ice creams. They tinkered with fruits, milk, and nuts, adding a fruit here and a nut there to bring to you a range of creamy goodness and exotic flavours. This new world created by these ice-cream chefs is the magical land of Camerry Ice creams!    
 </p>
 <p>     Camerry Ice Cream owes its origins to the Cousins Group, created in 1990 by five closeknit families. Well-known throughout Kerala and in the growing markets of Tamil Nadu and Karnataka for unrivaled freshness and world-class quality.    
 </p>
<p>
  Every morning, tanker loads of fresh milk is brought in fresh from a few select dairies. Fresh seasonal and exotic fruits arrive in parallel and are carefully cleaned, scooped and chopped to just the right sizes or turned into fresh pulp. Multiple ultra-modern and state-of-the-art, hygienic plants then get to work and turn the recipes created by our Ice Cream Chefs into those delectable dollops of ice creams that you indulge in.   
 </p>
 <p>
  Our Ice Cream crazy chefs are the stars. They are fanatical about using only freshest ingredients like rich creamy milk, exotic fruits, nuts and only natural flavours. They are constantly trying various permutations and combinations till the next Eureka moment. Once there it’s a frenzied race to get it quickly to you, so go ahead tell them about your experience every time you try a new Camerry Ice Cream. They are waiting to hear from you.  
     </p>
    </div> 
    <div>


<div>
        <div class="barnd">
       <div> 
        <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"
        alt="kiwi icon"
        width="60px"/>
        <h3>Kiwi Ice Cream</h3>
       </div>     
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="content">

    
    <p>
        Our journey began in 2010 when we realised the world deserved better, healthier ice cream. We started Kiwi at the Kinfra Food Processing Park, Kakkanchery, Malappuram. In order for Kiwi to own its state-of-the-art production facility, they helped us build it.  
    </p>
    <p>
        Throughout our history, we have been devoted to creating ice creams of the very highest quality. It is still a part of our ethos today. The commitment that we have shown has accelerated our growth to become one of the country's fastest-growing ice cream companies. As of now, we have opened a second production facility in Kanjikode, Palakkad, at Kinfra IIT Park, with a daily capacity of 30,000 litres.    
    </p>
    <p>
        Chocolate ice cream is creamy and made with two types of chocolate for a rich and deep taste. It is not overly sweet and is just as delicious as your favourite ice cream. With this recipe, you'll get an ultra-rich, thick, and creamy double chocolate custard ice cream with chocolate fudge swirled throughout. If you're a chocoholic, you'll love every bite of it.    
    </p>
    <p>
        Almost every ice cream recipe on our brand is a result of how much we love ice cream. All ice cream recipes will satisfy your sweet tooth, whether you prefer classic vanilla or a unique premium. Whatever the celebration, whip up a batch of your favourite batch and enjoy. You can also experiment with the taste of vanilla. In addition to maintaining impeccable hygiene in every part of our facility, each scoop of ice cream leaves our facility as a vegetarian     
    </p>
  </div>
</div>
<div>
